name: Circlet of Fire
effects: Fiery Return: When you deal ⁠Fire damage with a levelled spell, you  Burn yourself and gain an additional  Bonus Action this round.

location.description: This item is not present in the launch version of the game. Its effects have largely been replicated by the Pyroquickness Hat found in Act Three.

name: Enforcer Helmet
effects: Constitution  Saving Throws +1
Rejuvenating Takedown: Whenever the wearer knocks a creature unconscious, the wearer regains 1d6⁠⁠hit points.

location.description: * Not accessible through normal gameplay, but can still be accessed via third party tools.

name: Hat Of Uproarious Laughter
effects: Slippery Slapsticky: When knocked  Prone, hostile creature with an Intelligence of 5 or more within 9 m (30 ft) of you must succeed a Wisdom  Saving Throw or become stricken with  Laughter.

effects: Ensnaring Strands (): Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: Short rest.)

Web ( + ): Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: Long rest.)

Lightning Strikes: Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4⁠⁠Lightning.

name: Vampiric Gloves
effects: Vampiric Touch ( + ): Cast as a level 3 spell ( Recharge: Long rest.)

name: Briskwind Boots
effects: Critical Swiftness: After scoring a Critical Hit or killing a hostile creature, movement speed is restored to maximum.

name: Featherlight Boots
effects: Burst of Speed: When the wearer has 50% Hit Points or less, their Movement Speed is increased by 3 m (10 ft).

name: Gargoyle Boots
effects: Dexterity  Saving Throws +2
Gargoyle's Countenance (): Cast as a level 4 spell ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Shadowstep Boots
effects: Shadow Teleportation (): Teleport to an unoccupied, obscured spot. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Tenacious Boots
effects: Stand Like Stone: Spend 1 turn of  Force Conduit to become a strong bulwark that cannot be moved unwillingly ( Recharge: Short rest.
Athletics +1

name: Wavemother's Boots
effects: Watery Rejuvenation: If the wearer is standing in a  Water surface at the start of their turn, they heal 1d4⁠⁠hit points.

name: Dauntless Amulet
effects: Intelligence  Saving Throws +1
Dauntless: You can't be  Frightened or afflicted with other emotion-altering conditions.

name: Ilmater's Aid
effects: Strength in Suffering: Non-Cantrip spells deal an additional 1d4⁠⁠Force damage when the wearer drops to half their hit points or lower.

name: Kruznabir's Asylum Amulet
effects: Crown of Madness ( + ): Cast as a level 2 spell ( Recharge: Long rest.)

name: Lofty Sorcerer's Amulet
effects: Lofty Sorcery: Grants an additional sorcery point to the wearer, which is restored on long rest along with your normal sorcery points.

name: Scarab of Protection
effects: Spell Protection: You have  Advantage on  Saving throws against spells.
Necromantic Evasion: When you fail a  Saving throw against necromancy spells or spells cast by undead foes, you can use your reaction to succeed instead.

name: Synaptic Needle Amulet
effects: Mind Tax (): Cleave into a  Charmed or  Frightened foe's brain tissue and invigorate your body. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Treacleflow Amulet
effects: Rampart Aura: Costs  Force Conduit to remain active. All entities with or in this aura have their movement speed halved.

name: Wakeful Amulet
effects: Wakefulness: You can't be unwillingly put to  Sleep.

name: A Sparking Promise
effects: Ensnaring Shock (): Cast as a cantrip ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Absolute's Smite
effects: Searing Smite ( +  + ): Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: Long rest.)

effects: Vicious Mockery (): Cast as a cantrip at will.

name: Ring of Crabsight
effects: Perception +2

name: Ring of Fire
effects: Burning Fury: When dealing ⁠Fire damage, the wearer deals an additional 1⁠⁠Fire.

name: Ring of Restorative Gravity
effects: Saviour's Allure: You restore an additional 2⁠⁠hit points every time you heal another creature.

name: Sandthief's Ring
effects: Invisibility ( + ): Cast as a level 1 spell ( Recharge: Long rest.)

name: Arcane Absorption Dagger
effects: Arcane Absorption: When you kill an enemy with a melee attack, regain one of your spent 1st Level spell slots.
Piercing Strike (): Stab an enemy and possibly inflict  Gaping Wounds. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Blood-Bound Blade
effects: This blade's magical powers only function if it is bound to an Eldritch Knight or is a Warlock's Pact Weapon.
Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and  Attack rolls.
Synchronicity: This weapon deals additional damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
Pommel Strike (): Make a non-lethal attack against an enemy and possibly  Daze them. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Lacerate (): Slash at your target's vital points to make it  Bleed. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Rush Attack (): Charge forward and attack the first enemy in your way, possibly pushing them  Off Balance. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Combination Axe
effects: Critical Virtuoso: When you score a Critical Hit you can spend a  Bonus Action to make an additional attack.
Cleave (): Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to 3 enemies at once. They each take half the damage your weapon usually deals. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Lacerate (): Slash at your target's vital points to make it  Bleed. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Maiming Strike (): Possibly  Maims your target. They can't move. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Press the Advantage (): After scoring a critical hit, use your  Bonus Action to make an additional attack.

name: Dagger of Shar
effects: Grip of Shadows: Deals an additional 1d6⁠⁠Necrotic damage if the target is not standing in sunlight.
Piercing Strike (): Stab an enemy and possibly inflict  Gaping Wounds. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Edge of Darkness (): Create a cloud of Darkness while you attack. [See Notes] ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Devotee's Mace
effects: Healing Incense Aura (): Emanating a soothing aura, You and nearby allies regain 1d4⁠⁠Hit Points at the start of your turn ( Recharge: Long rest.)
Concussive Smash (): Hit an enemy with all your might to deal damage and possibly  Daze them. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Backbreaker (): Put extra force behind your strike to possibly knock your enemy  Prone. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

location.description: Obtained from casting the Arm Thy Servant variant of Divine Intervention. Once the party is level 10+, they can hire a cleric, have them cast Arm Thy Servant, then trade this weapon to another party member.

name: Doom Axe
effects: Edge of Terror: Each strike fills the target with a chilling dread that prevents it from regaining hit points. Undead creatures also get  Disadvantage on  Attack rolls.
Cleave (): Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to 3 enemies at once. They each take half the damage your weapon usually deals. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Lacerate (): Slash at your target's vital points to make it  Bleed. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

Prepare (): Spend 6 m / 20 ft of your movement to deal an additional Strength modifier⁠⁠PhysicalDRS damage (minimum 1) on each successful melee weapon attack for the rest of the turn. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Enforcer Club
effects: Non-Lethality: This weapon deals only Non-Lethal Damage.
Concussive Smash (): Hit an enemy with all your might to deal damage and possibly  Daze them. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Weakening Strike (): Target an enemy's hands with a non-lethal attack and possibly inflict  Weak Grip. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Backbreaker (): Put extra force behind your strike to possibly knock your enemy  Prone. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Executioner Sword
effects: Liberated Spellcasting: When you kill a creature, you can cast a Level 1 spell without expending a spell slot.
Flourish (): Feint an attack to possibly throw your opponent  Off Balance. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Piercing Strike (): Stab an enemy and possibly inflict  Gaping Wounds. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Exterminator's Axe

Cleave (): Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to 3 enemies at once. They each take half the damage your weapon usually deals. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Lacerate (): Slash at your target's vital points to make it  Bleed. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

Prepare (): Spend 6 m / 20 ft of your movement to deal an additional Strength modifier⁠⁠PhysicalDRS damage (minimum 1) on each successful melee weapon attack for the rest of the turn. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Spiderstep Staff
effects: Spider Step: Immune to being  Enwebbed. Your Movement Speed is not affected by  Web surfaces.

name: Staff of Accretion
effects: Accretion: The wearer gains  Arcane Charge when they deal damage with close-quarter-range spells or close-quarter-range cantrips.
Topple (): Swipe at a creature to knock it  Prone. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: The Clover
effects: Armour Class +1 (Off-Hand Only)
True Strike (): Cast as a cantrip ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Organ Rearranger: Reduce the number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking by 1. This effect can stack. When you roll 2 damage or less, reroll the dice, taking the highest result.
Exploit Weakness: Creatures hit with this weapon receive Vulnerability to ⁠Piercing damage.
True Strike Riposte: When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you may retaliate and gain  True Strike.
Flourish (): Feint an attack to possibly throw your opponent  Off Balance. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Lacerate (): Slash at your target's vital points to make it  Bleed. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: The Impaler
effects: Break the Unbroken: Deals an additional 1d10⁠⁠Piercing to targets that still have all their hit points.
Death Drinker: Gain 2d10 temporary hit points when landing a killing blow on an enemy with this weapon.
Brace (Melee) (): Spend 6 m / 20 ft of your movement. For the rest of your turn, roll melee damage twice and use the highest result. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Piercing Strike (): Stab an enemy and possibly inflict  Gaping Wounds. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Rush Attack (): Charge forward and attack the first enemy in your way, possibly pushing them  Off Balance. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

Bloodrender (): Deal additional damage equal to your proficiency bonus. On a successful hit, you gain   Bloodrender which lets you deal more damage at the cost of some hitpoints. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: The Undead Bane
effects: Slay the Wicked: This weapon deals an additional 1d6⁠⁠Slashing damage against Fiends and Undead.
Cleave (): Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to 3 enemies at once. They each take half the damage your weapon usually deals. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Lacerate (): Slash at your target's vital points to make it  Bleed. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

Prepare (): Spend 6 m / 20 ft of your movement to deal an additional Strength modifier⁠⁠PhysicalDRS damage (minimum 1) on each successful melee weapon attack for the rest of the turn. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

Profane Scourge (): Strike with subjugating fury, adding your proficiency bonus to the damage roll. If you hit a fiend or undead creature, deal an additional 2d6⁠⁠SlashingDRS damage and possibly  Bane it. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

location.description: Gur Camp X: 100 Y: -17: Carried by Ulma

name: Undead Slayer Crossbow
effects: Revenant Scourge: When used against undead creatures this weapon has +1d4 bonus to Attack and Damage rolls.
Piercing Shot (): Deal regular damage and possibly inflict  Gaping Wounds which cause extra damage on attacks. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Brace (Ranged) (): Spend 6 m (20 ft) of your movement. For the rest of your turn, roll ranged damage twice and use the highest result. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Vicious Shortsword
effects: Dolor Amarus: When you land a Critical Hit with a weapon or unarmed attack,[See: Bugs] it deals an additional 7 damage.
Flourish (): Feint an attack to possibly throw your opponent  Off Balance. ( Recharge: Short rest.)
Piercing Strike (): Stab an enemy and possibly inflict  Gaping Wounds. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

name: Woe
effects: Blight (): Cast as a level 4 spell ( Recharge: Long rest.)
Arcane Enchantment: You gain a +1 bonus to Spell Save DC and Spell Attack rolls.
Arcane Vampirism: When the creatures affected by your spells fail any associated  Saving Throws, you regain 1d4⁠⁠Hit Points.
Topple (): Swipe at a creature to knock it  Prone. ( Recharge: Short rest.)

location.description: Cazador's Dungeon X: -1925 Y: 944: Reward for defeating Cazador Szarr during the quest The Pale Elf

name: Enforcer Shield
effects:
Staunch Blessing: When a creature misses the wielder with an attack, they gain a +1d4 bonus to their next  Attack roll that deals non-lethal damage.

This bonus is relinquished when the wielder deals lethal damage.

name: Shield (Hope)
effects: No special properties, beyond the  Armour Class enchantment.

name: Shield +2
effects: No special properties, beyond the  Armour Class enchantment.

name: Shield of Returning
effects: Bound Weapon

name: Braindrain Cape
effects: Mental Debilitation: When the wearer succeeds a  Saving throw against any foe's spells or actions, that foe gains  Mental Fatigue.

name: Cloth Armour
effects: Grievous Retribution: When an enemy damages the wearer, the wearer gains  Wrath for 2 turns.

effects: Saving Throws +2

effects: Resistance to ⁠Cold damage.
